CustomField.description: Shows the Id of a product required by another. Used for Percent of Total products. IF(SBQQ__RequiredByProduct__c <> '' ,Customer Asset Account Id + SBQQ__RequiredByProduct__c, '')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Shows the Id of a product required by another. Used for Percent of Total products. IF(SBQQ__RequiredByProduct__c <> '' ,Customer Asset Account Id + SBQQ__RequiredByProduct__c, '')
CustomField.label: Parent Customer Asset Id
